KDV.name: Kobold Valley
KDV.description: A valley filled with dangerous Kobolds.

GCV.name: Cave Entrance
GCV.description: The opening to this dank cave reeks of Goblin.

GCV.name: Narrow Corridor
GCV.description: The cave stretches on into the darkness.

KDV.name: Western Overlook
KDV.description: A short cliff overlooks a small, fertile valley. You can see scores of Kobolds milling about doing whatever it is Kobolds do.
